error.bad_ics: URL did not provide valid calendar
error.bad_time: Check-in/out time is invalid. Use 24 hour time
error.unknown: Unexpected error, check logs for more details

data.days: Maximum number of days into the future to fetch
data.event_prefix: Prefix for all events (useful if linking more than one rental)
data.ignore_non_reserved: Ignore events that are not standard reservations
data.max_events: Number of event sensors to create
data.name: Calendar name
